Text: ReferenceI interviewed this morning with for a logistics job with the bandwidth trading group Paul Racicots After my qualifications for the job were established I mentioned to him that we were in the Army together in Germany He asked me if you could attest for my performance at the time and I told him yes Although in a previous life I sure hope you remember me and the great job I did maintaining L Troops readiness repair parts inventory and maintenance records throughout all all those border mission gunneries ARTEPs etc As a reminder L Troop always excelled on the inspections and supplied repair parts to the other unitsBen Bergfelt should definitely remember how good I made him and L Troop look I apologize if I was out of line mentioning your name only after my qualifications had been established but as CALME shuts down I am looking for a job I have attached my resume just in case you have a better job for me Regards Antonio
